attributes.action: stop food companies using halal products in british foods
attributes.additional_details: I am not in anyway a racist person , but it has come to my attention that a large number of British food companies are using halal products in foods without the publics knowledge . The latest food company is Subway not just using halal products they aim to ban Ham & Bacon from their menu's I find this absolutely deplorable .We live in a multi cultural society and I respect every religion but we are not all muslim's in this country so why are muslim beliefs been forced on everyone ?
